LIGHT_SENSOR_DARKENED - Enum constant in enum class SecurityLightController.LightControllerCommandInterface.CommandActionEnum
This signal indicates that the light sensor has been darkened, indicating diminished ambient light and the approach of nightfall.
LIGHT_SENSOR_LIGHTENED - Enum constant in enum class SecurityLightController.LightControllerCommandInterface.CommandActionEnum
This signal indicates that the light sensor has been lit up, indicating the sun is up and daylight is here.
LightControllerCommandInterface - Interface in SecurityLightController
This interface defines the light controller interface.
LightControllerCommandInterface.CommandActionEnum - Enum Class in SecurityLightController
This enumeration defines the events that the state machine is to respond to.
LightControllerStateMachine - Class in SecurityLightController
This class implements a state machine that can be used to control a security light.

This is the default constructor, which will instantiate a new instance of this class.
LightControllerStateMachineObserverInterface - Interface in SecurityLightController
This interface defines an interface which a class must implement if it desires to observe the lamp state.
LightControllerStateMachineObserverInterface.LightState - Enum Class in SecurityLightController
This enumeration will define the behavior of the overarching state machine.
LightControllerStateMachineObserverInterface.LightStateIntrusionDetectedStates - Enum Class in SecurityLightController
This enumeration will define the behavior of the Intrusion Detected Substate machine.
LightDeviceInterface - Interface in SecurityLightController
This interface defines those things which must be present for a light.
